script.title: ex-import.slax
script.author: phil
script.synopsis: Require that import policies do contain bare 'then accept' terms
script.description: We want to check if any of the named policies contain a bare 'then accept' term. This helps protect against importing the full routing table into these IGPs.
script.implementation: This example inspects the import statements configured under [protocols ospf] and [protocols isis] to see if any of the named policies contain a bare "then accept" term. This is meant to protect against importing the full routing table into these IGPs. The testing criteria in this example are likely not sufficient, but can easily be tuned or improved.
